import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; import axios from 'axios'; import classNames from 'classnames'; const initialValues = { email: "", password:'' }; export default class Login extends Component { render(){ return ( { const newUser = { full_name: fields.full_name, email: fields.email, contact_number: fields.contact_number, gender: fields.gender, password:fields.password }; axios.post("http://localhost:4000/register", newUser).then(res => { console.log(res.data); this.props.history.push("/"); }); }} render={({ values, errors, status, touched }) => (
)} /> ); } }
